secText:
Lesson:
1. Calculate the focal length using the [OBJ:expsec_u283:thin lens equation].
2. Calculate the [OBJ:expsec_u285:magnification] of a thin lens.
3. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_lens_1_question:calculate the object height] using magnification equations.
4. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_lens_2_question:calculate the focal length] using the thin lens and magnification equations.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_38502:Calculate] the image distance of a thin lens.
2. [OBJ:qc_36650:Calculate] magnification using object and image height.
3. [OBJ:qc_36654:Calculate] magnification using object and image height.
4. [OBJ:qc_37037:Calculate] magnification using the thin lens equation and magnification equations.
